sentence.Network_cn: 埃及军队依然有待考验。

entry.tran: 埃及的;埃及人的;埃及语的;埃及文化的
entry.def: Egyptian means belonging or relating to Egypt or to its people, language, or culture.
The Egyptians are the people who come from Egypt.
Egyptian means related to or connected with ancient Egypt.
The Egyptians were the people who lived in ancient Egypt.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Egypt
2. the ancient and now extinct language of Egypt under the Pharaohs; written records date back to 3000 BC
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Egypt or its people or their language

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"某种人,……的人"; 2. 表形容词,"……人的"; 3. 表形容词,"国家的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: lilliput小人国+ian……人的→adj.小人国的,气量小的
simi=sim+ian某种人,……的人→adj.猿的,猴的 n.类人猴
Arab阿拉伯人+ian国家的→adj.阿拉伯的
Athene雅典娜+ian国家的→adj.雅典的,雅典人的
Egypt埃及+ian国家的→adj.埃及的 n.埃及人
civil市民的+ian某种人,……的人→n.平民

custody保管+ian某种人,……的人→n.管理员,监护人
electric电的,导电的+ian某种人,……的人→n.电工,电学家
history历史+ian某种人,……的人→historian历史学家
library图书馆+ian某种人,……的人→n.图书馆员,图书管理员
simi=sim+ian某种人,……的人→adj.猿的,猴的 n.类人猴

stems_affixes.value_cn: 体弱的人,过份担心生病的人

Egypt埃及+ian国家的→adj.埃及的 n.埃及人

sentences.en: The ancient Egyptian civilization is one of the oldest in the world.
sentences.cn: 古埃及文化是世界上最古老的文化之一。

sentences.en: Carter found himself defending Bejin to the Egyptians and Sadat to the Israelis.
sentences.cn: 卡特发现他自己在埃及人面前为贝京辩护,而在以色列人面前是为萨达特辩护。

sentences.en: Many things left by the ancient Egyptians in tombs have been brought to light.
sentences.cn: 在古埃及的古陵墓中发掘出很多东西。

sentences.en: The Egyptians offered resolute resistance to the aggressors.
sentences.cn: 埃及人对侵略者作出坚决的反抗。
